property.name: enable_hive_interactive
property.description:
Enable or disable interactive query in this cluster.
Note: Hive LLAP may not start up on busy clusters if YARN pre-emption is not enabled. Enable via the YARN configs page.
property.display-name: Enable Interactive Query (Tech Preview, requires YARN pre-emption)

property.name: num_llap_nodes
property.description: Number of nodes used by Hive's LLAP, which includes nodes running : LLAP daemon, Slider and Tez App Master(s). Depends on memory settings
property.display-name: Desired number of nodes used by Hive's LLAP

property.name: llap_extra_slider_opts
property.description: Additional slider specific opts for llap such as port range
property.display-name: Additional slider specific opts for llap

property.name: num_retries_for_checking_llap_status
property.description: After starting LLAP app, retry count to check LLAP status before starting HiveServer2.
property.display-name: Number of retries while checking LLAP app status

property.name: llap_heap_size
property.description: LLAP Daemon Heap Size in MB.

property.name: slider_am_container_mb
property.description: Slider's app master container size in MB.

property.name: llap_headroom_space
property.description: Maximum headroom reserved from the YARN container running LLAP daemons. This is an upper limit used during automatic size calculations, and the actual value may be lower.

property.name: hive_aux_jars
property.description: List of jars to be made available to LLAP daemons

property.name: content
property.description: This is the jinja template for hive-env.sh file
